title: Compilation Error
description: The base category for all compilation errors.

title: Syntax Error
description: Errors related to the structure of the code.

title: Type Error
description: Errors related to type safety and compatibility.

title: Type Mismatch
description: The type of the expression does not match the expected type.

examples.explanation: Trying to assign a String to an Int variable.

solutions: Ensure the variable type matches the assigned value.
Use type conversion functions like .toInt() if applicable.
